sections.heading: was enacted into law by
sections.text:
the Legislative Assembly but was not added to or made a part of ORS chapter 312

or any series therein by legislative action. See Preface to Oregon Revised

Statutes for further explanation.

sections.heading: 13, chapter 475, Oregon
sections.text:
Laws 2025, provides:Sec. 13. Applicability to new foreclosures.(1)

Sections 3 to 6 and 8 to 10 of this 2025 Act [312.500 to 312.560] and the

amendments to ORS 98.352, 279A.025, 312.040 and 312.125 by sections 1, 2, 7 and

11 of this 2025 Act apply to claims for which the claimant received notice

under ORS 312.125 on or after May 25, 2023.
